name: Cookie Clicker - No Store Header + Separator Align
description: Disables "Store" title top-right corner to save space. Little addon for styles changing size of building list in Cookie Clicker game. Use when you have low screen resolution and want to see full building list. Additionally it aligns center and right horizontal separators to match vertical position. Compatible with 2.048
additional_info: Also check my other styles for Cookie Clicker: Cookie Clicker - Smaller Buildings List Cookie Clicker - Micro Buildings List
